member.name: T:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.InvalidPlaybackRateException
member.summary: Represents errors that occur when a playback rate specified is not supported for the media item.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin
member.summary: Represents a media plug-in that can play progressive download media.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.Play
member.summary: Starts playing the current media file from its current position.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.Pause
member.summary: Pauses the currently playing media.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.Stop
member.summary: Stops playing the current media.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.Load
member.summary: Loads a plug-in for playing progressive download media.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.Unload
member.summary: Unloads a plug-in for progressive download media.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.RequestLog
member.summary: Requests that this plugin generate a LogEntry via the LogReady event
Schedules an ad to be played by this plugin.
member.param: The source of the ad content.
The delivery method of the ad content.
The duration of the ad content that should be played. If ommitted the plugin will play the full duration of the ad content.
The position within the media where this ad should be played. If ommited ad will begin playing immediately.
The URL where the user should be directed when they click the ad.
Indicates if the timeline of the currently playing media should be paused while the ad is playing.
Another scheduled ad that this ad should be appended to. If ommitted this ad will be scheduled independently.
member.returns: A reference to the IAdContext that contains information about the scheduled ad.

member.name: E:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.PluginLoaded
member.summary: Occurs when the plug-in is loaded.

member.name: E:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.PluginUnloaded
member.summary: Occurs when the plug-in is unloaded.

member.name: E:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.PluginLoadFailed
member.summary: Occurs when an exception occurs when the plug-in is loaded.

member.name: E:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.PluginUnloadFailed
member.summary: Occurs when an exception occurs when the plug-in is unloaded.

member.name: E:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.LogReady
member.summary: Occurs when the log is ready.

member.name: E:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.SeekCompleted
member.summary: Occurs when a seek operation has completed.

member.name: E:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.BufferingProgressChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the percent of the media being buffered changes.

member.name: E:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.DownloadProgressChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the percent of the media downloaded changes.

member.name: E:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.MarkerReached
member.summary: Occurs when a marker defined for the media file has been reached.

member.name: E:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.MediaEnded
member.summary: Occurs when the media reaches the end.

member.name: E:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.MediaFailed
member.summary: Occurs when the media does not open successfully.

member.name: E:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.MediaOpened
member.summary: Occurs when the media successfully opens.

member.name: E:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.CurrentStateChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the state of playback for the media changes.

member.name: E:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.AdClickThrough
member.summary: Occurs when the user clicks on an ad.

member.name: E:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.AdError
member.summary: Occurs when there is an error playing an ad.

member.name: E:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.AdProgressUpdated
member.summary: Occurs when the progress of the currently playing ad has been updated.

member.name: E:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.AdStateChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the state of the currently playing ad has changed.

member.name: E:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.PlaybackRateChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the media's playback rate changes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.IsLoaded
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether a plug-in is currently loaded.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.AutoPlay
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the media file starts to play immediately after it is opened.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.Balance
member.summary: Gets or sets the ratio of the volume level across stereo speakers.
member.remarks: The value is in the range between -1 and 1. The default value of 0 signifies an equal volume between left and right stereo speakers. A value of -1 represents 100 percent volume in the speakers on the left, and a value of 1 represents 100 percent volume in the speakers on the right.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.CanPause
member.summary: Gets a value indicating if the current media item can be paused.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.CanSeek
member.summary: Gets a value indicating if the current media item allows seeking to a play position.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.Duration
member.summary: Gets the total time of the current media item.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.EndPosition
member.summary: Gets the end time of the current media item.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.IsMuted
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if the current media item is muted so that no audio is playing.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.LicenseAcquirer
member.summary: Gets or sets the LicenseAcquirer associated with the IMediaPlugin. The LicenseAcquirer handles acquiring licenses for DRM encrypted content.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.NaturalVideoSize
member.summary: Gets the size value (unscaled width and height) of the current media item.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.PlaybackRate
member.summary: Gets the play speed of the current media item.
member.remarks: A rate of 1.0 is normal speed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.CurrentState
member.summary: Gets the current state of the media item.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.ClipPosition
member.summary: Gets the current position of the clip.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.IsDecodingOnGPU
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the media is being decoded by the GPU.

member.name: E:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.MediaDrmSetupDecryptorCompleted
member.summary: Only used when a custom MediaStreamSource is set.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.Position
member.summary: Gets the current position of the media item.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.SupportsAdScheduling
member.summary: Gets whether this plugin supports ad scheduling.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.StartPosition
member.summary: Gets the start position of the current media item (0).

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.Stretch
member.summary: Gets the stretch setting for the current media item.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.EnableGPUAcceleration
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to enable GPU acceleration. In the case of the Progressive MediaElement, the CacheMode being set to BitmapCache is the equivalent of setting EnableGPUAcceleration = true

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.SupportedDeliveryMethods
member.summary: Gets the delivery methods supported by this plugin.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.SupportedPlaybackRates
member.summary: Gets a collection of the playback rates for the current media item.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.VisualElement
member.summary: Gets a reference to the media player control.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.Volume
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial volume setting as a value between 0 and 1.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.DroppedFramesPerSecond
member.summary: Gets the dropped frames per second.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.RenderedFramesPerSecond
member.summary: Gets the rendered frames per second.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.BufferingProgress
member.summary: Gets the percentage of the current buffering that is completed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.BufferingTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time for the current buffering action.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.DownloadProgress
member.summary: Gets the percentage of the current buffering that is completed

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.DownloadProgressOffset
member.summary: Gets the download progress offset

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.ProgressiveMediaPlugin.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the location of the media file.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.Resources.ProgressiveMediaPluginResources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.Resources.ProgressiveMediaPluginResources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.Resources.ProgressiveMediaPluginResources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.Resources.ProgressiveMediaPluginResources.MediaElementGeneratedLogMessageFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Media Element Generated Log - Reason: {0}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.Resources.ProgressiveMediaPluginResources.ProgressiveMediaPluginInstantiatedLogMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ProgressiveMediaPlugin Instantiated.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.Resources.ProgressiveMediaPluginResources.ProgressiveMediaPluginLoadedLogMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ProgressiveMediaPlugin Loaded.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.Resources.ProgressiveMediaPluginResources.ProgressiveMediaPluginUnloadedLogMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ProgressiveMediaPlugin Unloaded.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.Resources.ProgressiveMediaPluginResources.TimelineMarkerReached
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Timeline Marker Reached - Time: {0} Type: {1} Text: {2}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Progressive.Resources.ProgressiveMediaPluginResources.UnsupportedPlaybackRateMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {0} is not a valid Playback Rate.
